#include "stdio.h"
int main() {
    char s[]="****A*BC*DEF*G*****",*t=s;
    int i,j;
    while(*t) {
        t++;
    }
    t--;
    while(*t=='*') {
        t--;
    }
    for(i=0,j=0; &s[i]!=t; i++) {
        if(s[i]!='*')
            s[j++]=s[i];
    }
    while(*t) {
        s[j++]=*t++;
    }
    s[j]='\0';
    puts(s);
    return 0;
}

#include "stdio.h"
int main() {
    char s[]="****A*BC*DEF*G*****",*t=s;
    int i,j;
    while(*++t);
    while(*--t=='*');
    for(i=0,j=0; &s[i]!=t; i++) {
        if(s[i]!='*') s[j++]=s[i];
    }
    while(*t) {
        s[j++]=*t++;
    }
    s[j]='\0';
    puts(s);
    return 0;
}

#include<string.h>
int strcmp ( char* src,char* dst)
{
    int ret = 0 ;
    while( !(ret = *src - *dst) && *dst)
        ++src, ++dst;
    if ( ret < 0 )
        ret = -1 ;
    else if ( ret > 0 )
        ret = 1 ;
    return( ret );
}

#include<stdio.h>
int insertsort(int a[],int n) {
    int bottom,mid,top,temp,i,j;
    for(i=1; i<n; i++) {
        //bottomå€¼ä¸º0,topå€¼ä¸ºè¢«æ’åºå€¼å‰ä¸€ä½
        bottom=0;
        top=i-1;
        while(bottom<=top) {
            mid=(bottom+top)/2;
            if(a[i]>a[mid])
                bottom=mid+1;
            else
                top=mid-1;
        } 
        //å½“å‰midä¸ºæœ€æ¥è¿‘è¢«æ’åºå€¼çš„ä½ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¢«æ’åºå€¼å¤§äºmidã€‚åˆ™mid++

        //midä»¥ååˆ°i-1æ•´ä½“åç§»ä¸€ä½ï¼Œè¢«æ’åºå€¼ä¸a[mid]äº¤æ¢
        temp=a[i];
        for(j=i-1; j>=mid; j--)

        //æ¯æ¬¡æ’åºéƒ½æ‰“å°ï¼ˆæ­¤å¤„ç†è§£ç”¨ï¼‰
        printf("i=%d,mid=%d\n",i,mid);

}

{   int x[]= {23,7,823,586,2,1,6,11};

}

int insertsort(int a[],int n) {

        bottom=0;

            //å½“å‰midä¸ºæœ€æ¥è¿‘è¢«æ’åºå€¼çš„ä½ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¢«æ’åºå€¼å°äºmidã€‚åˆ™mid++

        temp=a[i];

#include<stdio.h>
int insertsort(int a[],int n) {
    int bottom,mid,top,i,j;
    for(i=2; i<=n; i++) {
        //a[0]ä¸ºç©ºé—²ï¼Œä½œä¸ºå“¨å…µæ˜¯tempçš„ä½œç”¨,ä¸å‚ä¸æ’åº
        a[0]=a[i];

        while(bottom<=top) {
            mid=(bottom+top)/2;
            if(a[0]>a[mid])
                bottom=mid+1;
            else
                top=mid-1;
        }
        for(j=i-1; j>=top+1; j--)

{

            break;
        e += x;
    }
    printf("%9.10f\n", e);
    return 0;
}

#include<stdio.h>
char *strstr (char *str1,char *str2) {
    char *cp = str1;
    char *s1, *s2;
    if ( !*str2 )
        return(str1);
    while (*cp) {
        s1 = cp;
        s2 = str2;
        while ( *s1 && *s2 && !(*s1-*s2) )
            s1++, s2++;
        if (!*s2)
            return(cp);
        cp++;
    }
    return(NULL);
}
int main()
{
    char *p=strstr("a12345633258","56");
    printf("%s",p);
    return 0;
}

#include<stdio.h>
char *strchr (char *string,int ch) {
    while (*string && *string != (char)ch)
        string++;
    if (*string == (char)ch)
        return(string);
    return(NULL);
}
int main()
{
    char *p=strchr("123",'3');
    printf("%c",*p);
    return 0;
}

#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
double pi(double eps)
{
    double t=1.0,s=0.0;
    int n=1,i=0;

    while(fabs(t)>=eps) {
        t=pow(-1,i)/(2*n-1);
        s+=t;
        i++;
        n++;
    }
    return s*4;
}
int main()
{
    //epsä¸ºç²¾åº¦æ§åˆ¶
    double eps=1e-6;
    printf("%.6f\n",pi(eps));
    return 0;
}

#include<stdio.h>
int find(int n[],int x,int low,int high) {
    if(high>=low) {
        int mid = (low + high)/2;
        if(x>n[mid])
            return find(n,x,mid+1,high);
        else if(x<n[mid])
            return find(n,x,low,mid-1);
        else
            return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
}
int main() {
    int a[]= {1,2,4,5,8,9,10};
    printf("%d",find(a,8,0,6));
    return 0;
}

            case 8:
                grade = 'B';
                break;
            case 7:
                grade = 'C';
                break;
            case 6:
                grade = 'D';
                break;
            default:
                grade = 'E';
                break;
        }
        putchar(grade);
        return 0;

#include <stdio.h>
int main() {
    int letter = 0, digit = 0, other = 0;
    char ch;
    while ((ch = getchar()) != '!') {
        if (ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'z' || ch >= 'A' && ch <= 'Z')
            letter++;
        else if (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
            digit++;
        else
            other++;
    }
    printf("letter:%d\ndigit:%d\nother:%d\n", letter, digit, other);
    return 0;
}
